/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, stretches out ahead, flanked by buildings on both sides. A variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, traverse the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene.

On either side of the street, trees stand tall, their green foliage contrasting with the urban landscape. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network of lines against the sky. Buildings of different heights and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city.

The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the colors of the cityscape. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the energy and vibrancy of the city.
